english.segment1: (Verse). Heaven love. With glory ringing. Fill the air. With angels singing
english.segment2: Earth take up. The heavenly cry. The Lord of All. Reigns on high
english.segment3: Earth below. And heaven above. Resound your glory. And your love
english.segment4: O King of Kings. Our Sacred Joy. What a miracle. You come for all
english.segment5: . (Chorus). O what a miracle. You come for all. To save us all away
english.segment6: O what a miracle. You come for all. To lift us from the grave
english.segment7: O what a miracle. So wonderful. You're a miracle
english.segment8: (Bridge). A miracle. A miracle. A miracle
